Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Writer: Eric Pearson, Craig Kyle, Christopher L. Yost, Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Larry Lieber (based on the Marvel comics by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel comics by)
Actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Idris Elba
Plot: Thor (Chris Hemsworth) is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela (Cate Blanchett).
